title: Thunderbird
content: Your latest request for donations has evidently come with a forced upgrade which I did not authorise. I have been happily using an older version of TB because it supports my add-ons and themes. Now because of your uninvited intrusion they no longer work. Furthermore it seems that I can no longer download an older version that supports my requirements. NOT HAPPY!
creator: adastron

title: Thunderbird Recent update
content:
Ok people who actually write this program. It is possible that you are not guilty of this, but I am seriously suspicious. Your recent auto update automatically either ERASED my email messages and/or automatically changed the storage folder, or just changed the folder.

And :I cannot remember where I was putting them before to try and recover anything. Somewhere on my terabyte D drive because my C drive was full.

Any ideas on how to my messages back?

Lost in email

title: Thunderbird now locking up (unresponsive) when downloading messages - sometimes for up to a minute or two
content: Since upgrading to 140.0esr on Thunderbird, client freezes (Windows 11 indicates as "Thunderbird is not responding") for anything from a couple of seconds up to a minute or two whenever downloading emails in the background. This is very annoying, especially when trying to write a new message (or even while commenting here in the Ideas panel). My main account is on a Microsoft Exchange service, so I need to use the OWL add-in but the delays also seem to occur when accessing gmail. The other "feature" which seems to have changed is inbox defaulting to top then running through to end when sorted with most recent at bottom. I have now reversed to have most recent on top, which seems to have resolved, but this was also annoying. Attempted to resolve by clearing 1 GB from cache and archiving about 15K conversations - but interruptions not significantly improved. Until a few days ago Thunderbird seemed to run without any problems. Any suggestions?
creator: richard29

title: Thunderbird non crea nuovi messaggi
content:
Dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento il tasto "Crea nuovo messaggio", la relativa shortcut e anche se clicco su un indirizzo email, non si apre più la finestra per creare un nuovo messaggio di posta elettronica. Ho provato a reinstallare (senza disinstallare) ma non cambia nulla.

Qualcuno ha informazioni in merito a questo problema?
creator: radiokalika

title: サンダーバードメールのメールフォルダーが消えてしまった
content: 2~3日前にも同じ状態にになったのですが、ヘルプをいろいろ調べているうちに正常に表示されるようになりました、ヘルプを調べているうちにトラブルシューティングを押していたのかもしれません。…が、今日ももんだいなくしようしていましたが、一旦停止してい、次に作業を再開すると　 またメールフォルダーが消えてしまってました。今回はトラブルシューティングもしてみましたが、全くどうにもならないのですが、 何とかメールフォルダーを表示するほうほうがないでしょうか？…私は視力が非常に悪く視界もごくわずかしかないので、PCの画面も読むのに時間がかかり。返事にも思うように打ちづらくいろいろと教えていただくのに手間をおかけしますが何卒宜しくお願い致します。
creator: raiken-k417
